question: The Union Cabinet approved the MoU between India and this country to establish bilateral cooperation activities in the field of Intellectual Property (IP).
explanation: The Union Cabinet approved the MoU between India and Canada to establish bilateral cooperation activities in the field of Intellectual Property (IP). The MoU is intended to promote innovation, creativity and economic growth in both countries. Both countries can exchange best practices and work together to raise awareness on IPRs and better protect Intellectual Property Rights (IPRs).
